post.body: Agreed. The trailer felt flat and rather unfunny... But, I wasn't compelled to play Psychonauts by the trailers, so...
Oh, but I love Wikipedia... A great place for basic info on general research... Not prone to the stupid, but I still like it...
User ratings are wonderful, but too many stupid people abuse these systems, and I have yet to trust a site's means of filtering...
I'm sick of how EVERY site feels it needs to be a variation on social networking, so in order to do anything, you need a password...
I've never been one for goat cheese... But, I think I might like it better than brie at this point...
True, but it's done a nice job of holding me over since I quitt√©d the mother land... And yes, a spot of Roquefort would be nice...
Noooo!!! I am most certain that week will turn out to be long and unbearable for me... A week without Wanda = a week without love...
Need I mention again your seemingly unhealthy obsession with dear Wanda? Well, I won't, because it cracks me up... Academics!
Good to know. He's in, but he's not, all at the same time... Stupid rainchecks...
Oh, and my brother wants to know if 185 is really three days a week...
It takes a bit the first time you try it. Keep the cursor on the word for at least a good 30 seconds to a minute...
Typical. Always havin' babies to get out of finals. I hope you punished them accordingly...
They... Did THEY all die academically...
Did anyone die? Or did the all die academically?
I did know this. Beware, tho... The Lifetime/DVD cut is pretty awful... Jeff's cut is MUCH better...
Will Season 5 of LOST please start already? Cuz it's killing me to wait any more... Really, I'm dying here, Darlton.... DYING....
It's rainy out, and my nose is stuffed up... It must be Christmastime...
Just finished the Joe Wright "Pride & Prejudice"... Gorgeous film... England never looked so sumptuous...
I feel a cold coming on...
Murmur, murmur, murmur...
On a happier note, there's apparently a restaurant where it's ALWAYS Thanksgiving... Um, is it called Heaven? Cuz I think it is...
Is it hypocritical to express my distaste with Web 2.0 on both Twitter and Facebook? Cuz other than those 2 things, I'm kinda done with it.
The Deer Hunter = Depressing Masterpiece... Wow...
I think I've officially lost my taste for brie... Which is unfortunate for many, many reasons... Nasty...
Is it weird that I love just about anything with Meryl Streep in it? Seriously, anything...
Holy Crap, Pushing Daisies this week was goooooooood....
I just found out my good friends are having twins... It's a Christmas miracle! For them... :-(
Mac users: select a word in Safari, and hold Ctrl-Cmmd-D... It's a pretty sweet feature, I say... Lifelong Mac user, and I'm still amazed...
Seinfeld spoofs Oliver Stone well...
Blurg...
In other words, he combs it over... A lot...
Turns our Spielberg's hairline is more like Ron Howard's than I initially thought... Explains the hats, it does...
Spoiler Alert: Goose just died... Man, it's sad every time...
*Unibrow courtesy of the unbelievable clarity of Blu-ray...
Watching Top Gun... Tom Cruise wears his unibrow proudly in this film...
